entities.name: bertha
entities.description: Bertha is mentioned as a girl who was seen kissing someone behind the greenhouses. She is also referred to as Bertha Jorkins by Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is an old man and the headmaster of Hogwarts school. He is talking to Harry in the Pensieve.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is talking to Dumbledore in the Pensieve.

entities.name: florence
entities.description: Florence is mentioned as someone who was seen kissing Harry behind the greenhouses.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is a magical device that Dumbledore uses to store and view memories.

entities.name: greenhouses
entities.description: The greenhouses are mentioned as the location where Harry was seen kissing Florence.

relationships.description: Harry and Florence were seen kissing behind the greenhouses.
Dumbledore remembers Bertha from his school days.
